summary: Converted assets originally created by mr_siika.
descriptionHtml:
=========================
Grifforn Fortress Resource
=========================

By mr_siika

Converted by Kraeten

=========================
Modder\'s Resource
=========================

This is a collection of static resources that were originally created by mr_siika for Oblivion. You\'ll find approximately 107 meshes in this resource, which is comprised of castle walls, towers, interior walls, pedestals, and a griffon statue. Since the stairs were designed for Oblivion characters, you may need to use collision planes for NPC\'s to use them smoothly. You can find the original file below. 

Griffon Fortress: http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/14830/?

=========================
Tools Used
=========================
Nifskope
NifUtils by Skyfox
3DS Max

=================
Permissions:
=================

This is a modders resource.You may use the meshes for your own mods as long as you give credit and you do not charge money for it.

Do not upload to other sites without express permission. 
mr_siika has been away from modding for quite some time, and will likely not return to the forums. Deeza was originally granted permission to port the assets featured in this resource, and it is on his behalf that I converted these. Should anyone have further questions, feel free to private message me. Be sure to check out the Beyond Skyrim project where this resource will be utilized, at Dark Creations. 

http://www.darkcreations.org/forums/forum/119-beyond-skyrim/

=================
Credits:
=================

mr_siika for his resources and for everything he has given to the TES community! Give this gentleman a kudos!
The Niftools team for giving us Nifskope.
Skyfox from the Niftools team for his great tool NifUtils
1shoedpunk and Tamira for mentoring me as I learned how to convert models from Oblivion.
Centurion for testing and otherwise looking over the set. 
Deeza for his encouragement.
author: mr_siika and Kraeten
